Articles.Content: I'm curious, are there any plans by the developers to release a set of developer tools to speed up and ease in add-on/plugin development for this game?

PartTools & Wiki

Wiki link above.

PartTools: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/15998-0-16-PartTools

Note game is still in development and that the basis for modding also is still in development.
